description: Citrix XenDesktop 7.6 course provides students with the skills required to successfully deploy a complete Citrix hosted application and desktop virtualization solution in a Windows Server 2012 R2 environment. Throughout this course, students will learn how to configure an environment that includes the Different Citrix XenDesktop 7.6 components which required in a XenApp/ XenDesktop 7.6 implementation, the FMA-based architecture, as well as key use cases. Upon course completion, students will be able to build a XenDesktop 7.6 environment from scratch and test the implementation to ensure that all components work as expected and that both internal and external end users can access XenDesktop resources successfully.
title: Citrix XenDesktop 7.6 - Deploying App and Desktop Solutions
